lead_paragraph: Secret Gypsy did not want to load into the starting gate, but once the race was on she blazed through five and a half furlongs to set a track record at Saratoga Race Course yesterday.Secret Gypsy won the first start of her career impressively, besting a field of 10 by six and a quarter lengths as she cruised home under jockey Kent Desormeaux in 1:03.26, breaking the track record of 1:03.32 set by Mayakovsky on July 25, 2001. Secret Gypsy, a chestnut daughter of Sea of Secrets, paid $29.20 for a $2 bet to win.
